title: Queen Vashti Deposed
summary: King Xerxes (Ahasuerus) holds a grand banquet and commands Queen Vashti to appear before the guests. She refuses, leading to her removal as queen. A search is declared to find a new queen.

faq.question: Why was Queen Vashti removed?
faq.answer: She refused to appear before the king and his guests at his command.

faq.question: What did the king decide to do afterward?
faq.answer: He planned to find a new queen, leading to Esther's future selection.
